s.text: Can we ask security to check their surveillance footage for any suspicious activity around my desk?
I *always* lock my drawers and keep the key in the same place, but on arriving in the office today I found the drawers unlocked, and the key missing.
Having been out of the office for a couple of days, I've found myself the victim of theft (again).
I also found the papers on my desk extensively reshuffled last week.

Message-ID: <25447472.1075856582182.JavaMail.evans@thyme> Date: Wed, 14 Jun 2000 09:16:00 -0700 (PDT) From: steven.leppard@enron.com To: dale.surbey@enron.com Subject: Security question Cc: grant.masson@enron.com, vince.kaminski@enron.com Mime-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Bcc: grant.masson@enron.com, vince.kaminski@enron.com
Last year, in our old office, I had my only two real options books stolen from among the many and varied books on my desk.
